message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $750000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $800000. I'm looking forward to hearing back from you.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but $750000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time.  I'm willing to pay $700000 for it.  Let me know if you're open to that.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $700000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $725000. This is a great compromise that still reflects the product's value to you, while also being a fair price for me. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
